content: Yes, Cafe de la Nouvelle Mairie serves breakfast, brunch, and light meals throughout the day. Their breakfast menu includes options such as croissants, pain au chocolat, bread and butter, and granola with yogurt and fruits. They also offer a brunch menu on weekends, which includes a variety of savory and sweet dishes such as avocado toast, eggs benedict, and pancakes. In addition to breakfast and brunch, they also serve salads, sandwiches, and quiches for lunch. Their menu changes regularly to feature fresh and seasonal ingredients, so there's always something new to try.
